arts.ttl: Espanyol star makes history in win over Celta Vigo
arts.sum: Espanyol star Roberto Fernández secured for himself a piece of history on Saturday evening. This came owing to his exploits in the club’s latest outing. Espanyol marked their return to action…

arts.ttl: LaLiga injury news, predicted lineups, fantasy updates
arts.sum: Find out who is missing through injury and who is in a race against time to prove their fitness in Spain's LaLiga this weekend.
